flavorText: In ages past, Esper couriers bore messages written on ornate scrolls. The medium has grown more sophisticated, but the principle remains the same.

foreignData.flavorText: In vergangenen Zeiten überbrachten Kuriere in Esper verzierte Schriftrollen. Das Medium hat sich verändert, das Prinzip ist gleich geblieben.
foreignData.name: Kapsel des Kuriers
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, opfere die Kapsel des Kuriers: Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: En eras pasadas, los mensajeros de Esper llevaban mensajes escritos en pergaminos adornados. El medio es ahora mucho más sofisticado, pero el principio es el mismo.
foreignData.name: Cápsula del mensajero
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, sacrificar la Cápsula del mensajero: Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Jadis, les messagers d'Esper transportaient des messages écrits sur des parchemins ornés. L'objet est devenu plus sophistiqué, mais le principe reste le même.
foreignData.name: Capsule du messager
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, sacrifiez la Capsule du messager : Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: In passato, i corrieri di Esper recavano messaggi scritti su pergamene decorate. Lo strumento è diventato più sofisticato, ma il principio è rimasto lo stesso.
foreignData.name: Capsula del Corriere
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifica la Capsula del Corriere: Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 過去何世代もの間、エスパーの急使は飾り立てられた巻物に書かれた書簡を運んでいた。 その後、手段はより洗練されていったが、書かれる内容は変わりがない。
foreignData.name: 急使の薬包
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, 急使の薬包を生け贄に捧げる：カードを２枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Nas eras passadas, os mensageiros de Esper levavam mensagens escritas em pergaminhos decorados. O meio tornou-se mais sofisticado, mas os princípios permanecem os mesmos.
foreignData.name: Cápsula do Mensageiro
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifique Cápsula do Mensageiro: Compre dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: В стародавние времена эсперские гонцы переносили послания, написанные на богато украшенных свитках. Теперь средство стало более сложным, но принцип остался прежним.
foreignData.name: Капсула Гонца
foreignData.text: {1}{U}, {T}, пожертвуйте Капсулу Гонца: возьмите две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 在很久以前，艾斯波讯使身上携带的是写在华美卷轴上的讯息。 承载讯息的东西已更加精致，但原理依旧相同。
foreignData.name: 讯使坠盒

name: Courier's Capsule
originalText: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Capsule: Draw two cards.

rulings.text: The only difference between a colored artifact and a colorless artifact is, obviously, its color. Unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact requires colored mana to cast. Also unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact has a color in all zones. It will interact with cards that care about color. Other than that, a colored artifact behaves just like any other artifact. It will interact as normal with any card that cares about artifacts, such as Shatter or Arcbound Ravager.

text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Capsule: Draw two cards.
